body_html:
Hi, thanks for your answer, actually, I just follow the tutorial for ios application:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile
and also, I install tensorflow with Docker container, So if I want to continue to the IOS application implement, what should I do, just follow the canonical way with bazel or with the source installation, or the docker version???
Thank you in advance:)
Hao

body:
Hi, thanks for your answer, actually, I just follow the tutorial for ios application:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile
and also, I install tensorflow with Docker container, So if I want to continue to the IOS application implement, what should I do, just follow the canonical way with bazel or with the source installation, or the docker version???
Thank you in advance:)
Hao
